vista.graph
Class TickLine

java.lang.Object
  vista.graph.GraphicElement
      vista.graph.TickLine
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, Animate, Bounded, Drawable
public class TickLine
extends GraphicElement

This implements a line with major ticks and minor ticks. The line drawn is one one of the edges of the bounds depending upon the elements position. The tick marks may lie outside the bounds and so clipping has to be off if some of the tick marks need to be visible.

Version:
$Id: TickLine.java,v 1.1 2003/10/02 20:49:10 redwood Exp $
Author:
Nicky Sandhu
